QuestData.Title: Draconic Mending
QuestData.Description: Our dragons are returning from battle covered in Twilight corrupted flame and pursued by Twilight drakes.$B$BMy menders can tend to our dragons' wounds, but they must be defended. Keep the drakes off of my menders. Lend your healing to our dragons as well if you are able.$B$BThank you for your help with this. Our battles for Grim Batol are never-ending. We need to get our strongest dragons back into the battle as soon as possible.
QuestData.LogDescription: Safeguard 5 Vermillion Menders as they heal wounded dragons.
QuestData.CompletionText: Keep the menders safe as they heal our wounded dragons!
QuestData.RewardText: We will take Grim Batol back from the Twilight's Hammer and their allies. It may take time, but this is one charge that we cannot forsake.
